extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto !important;} .sboxCell select{ max-width: 260px; } #topContentBox ul.searchForm_ul li .formSub:lang(en) { margin-right: 0.5px; } #topContentBox ul.searchForm_ul li:lang(en) { margin: 3% 0 0; } .subContentNav ul li, .subContentNavSpa ul li { width: auto; } .tbl th { white-space: normal; }
